title: How to Listen to Podcasts on Android

steps.title: Download the Podcast Player app from the Play Store.
steps.content: Download the Podcast Player app from the Play Store. Search the Podcast Player app on Google Play, and tap the green INSTALL button to download it. Podcast Player is a free, third-party app that allows you to download and listen to podcasts.

steps.title: Open the Podcast Player app on your Android.
steps.content: Open the Podcast Player app on your Android. The Podcast Player icon looks like a white radio tower in a purple circle. You can find it on your Apps menu.

steps.title: Select your topics of interest.
steps.content: Select your topics of interest. When you first open the app, you'll be prompted to select categories and topics that interest you. Tap a topic here to select it. You have to select at least 3 interest topics here. If you see more topics that interest you, feel free to choose more.

steps.title: Tap the Next button.
steps.content: Tap the Next button. This will confirm your interest topics, and recommend you some podcasts based on your interests.

steps.title: Tap SKIP on the top-right.
steps.content: Tap SKIP on the top-right. This will skip the recommendations page, and open the Podcasts home page. Alternatively, you can tap the " + " sign next to a podcast recommendation here to follow it.

steps.title: Tap a podcast on the Podcasts page.
steps.content: Tap a podcast on the Podcasts page. Find an interesting podcast, and tap on its name or icon to see a list of episodes. The Podcasts page opens up to the FEATURED tab. You can browse other podcasts by switching to one of the TRENDING , CATEGORIES , or NETWORKS tabs at the top.

steps.title: Tap the Subscribe button.
steps.content: Tap the Subscribe button. This is a purple button at the top of the episodes list. It will subscribe you to the selected podcast.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap an episode.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap an episode. This will open the selected episode's details on a pop-up panel.

steps.title: Tap the button.
steps.content: Tap the button. This button is on the right-hand side of your screen. It will start playing the selected episode.
